title: How can I get started with Azure Private Link | Azure Tips and Tricks
excerpt: In this video of Azure Tips and Tricks, you'll learn what Azure Private Link is and how you can get started with it.   For more tips and tricks, visit: http://azuredev.tips  Get started with 12 months of free services and $200 USD in credit. Create your free account today with Microsoft Azure: http://azure.com/free
